00063 static PyTypeObject BlenderAppType;
00064 
00065 static PyStructSequence_Field app_info_fields[] = {
00066     {(char *)"version", (char *)"The Blender version as a tuple of 3 numbers. eg. (2, 50, 11)"},
00067     {(char *)"version_string", (char *)"The Blender version formatted as a string"},

00080     {(char *)"build_cxxflags", (char *)"C++ compiler flags"},

00082     {(char *)"build_system", (char *)"Build system used"},

00085     {(char *)"ffmpeg", (char *)"FFmpeg library information backend"},

00090 static PyStructSequence_Desc app_info_desc = {
00091     (char *)"bpy.app",     /* name */
00092     (char *)"This module contains application values that remain unchanged during runtime.",    /* doc */
00093     app_info_fields,    /* fields */
00094     (sizeof(app_info_fields) / sizeof(PyStructSequence_Field)) - 1
00095 };
00096 
00097 static PyObject *make_app_info(void)
00098 {
00099     PyObject *app_info;
00100     int pos = 0;
00101 
00102     app_info = PyStructSequence_New(&BlenderAppType);
00103     if (app_info == NULL) {
00104         return NULL;
00105     }
00106 
00107 #define SetIntItem(flag) \
00108     PyStructSequence_SET_ITEM(app_info, pos++, PyLong_FromLong(flag))
00109 #define SetStrItem(str) \
00110     PyStructSequence_SET_ITEM(app_info, pos++, PyUnicode_FromString(str))
00111 #define SetBytesItem(str) \
00112     PyStructSequence_SET_ITEM(app_info, pos++, PyBytes_FromString(str))
00113 #define SetObjItem(obj) \
00114     PyStructSequence_SET_ITEM(app_info, pos++, obj)
00115 
00116     SetObjItem(Py_BuildValue("(iii)",
00117                              BLENDER_VERSION / 100, BLENDER_VERSION % 100, BLENDER_SUBVERSION));
00118     SetObjItem(PyUnicode_FromFormat("%d.%02d (sub %d)",
00119                                     BLENDER_VERSION / 100, BLENDER_VERSION % 100, BLENDER_SUBVERSION));
00120 
00121     SetStrItem(STRINGIFY(BLENDER_VERSION_CHAR));
00122     SetStrItem(STRINGIFY(BLENDER_VERSION_CYCLE));
00123     SetStrItem(BLI_program_path());
00124     SetObjItem(PyBool_FromLong(G.background));
00125 
00126     /* build info, use bytes since we can't assume _any_ encoding:
00127      * see patch [#30154] for issue */
00128 #ifdef BUILD_DATE
00129     SetBytesItem(build_date);
00130     SetBytesItem(build_time);
00131     SetBytesItem(build_rev);
00132     SetBytesItem(build_platform);
00133     SetBytesItem(build_type);
00134     SetBytesItem(build_cflags);
00135     SetBytesItem(build_cxxflags);
00136     SetBytesItem(build_linkflags);
00137     SetBytesItem(build_system);
00138 #else
00139     SetBytesItem("Unknown");
00140     SetBytesItem("Unknown");
00141     SetBytesItem("Unknown");
00142     SetBytesItem("Unknown");
00143     SetBytesItem("Unknown");
00144     SetBytesItem("Unknown");
00145     SetBytesItem("Unknown");
00146     SetBytesItem("Unknown");
00147     SetBytesItem("Unknown");
00148 #endif
00149 
00150     SetObjItem(BPY_app_ffmpeg_struct());
00151     SetObjItem(BPY_app_handlers_struct());
00152 
00153 #undef SetIntItem
00154 #undef SetStrItem
00155 #undef SetBytesItem
00156 #undef SetObjItem
00157 
00158     if (PyErr_Occurred()) {
00159         Py_CLEAR(app_info);
00160         return NULL;
00161     }
00162     return app_info;
00163 }
00164 
00165 /* a few getsets because it makes sense for them to be in bpy.app even though
00166  * they are not static */
00167 
00168 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_app_debug_doc,
00169 "Boolean, for debug info (started with --debug / --debug_* matching this attribute name)"
00170 );
00171 static PyObject *bpy_app_debug_get(PyObject *UNUSED(self), void *closure)
00172 {
00173     const int flag = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(closure);
00174     return PyBool_FromLong(G.debug & flag);
00175 }
00176 
00177 static int bpy_app_debug_set(PyObject *UNUSED(self), PyObject *value, void *closure)
00178 {
00179     const int flag = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(closure);
00180     const int param = PyObject_IsTrue(value);
00181 
00182     if (param < 0) {
00183         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError, "bpy.app.debug can only be True/False");
00184         return -1;
00185     }
00186     
00187     if (param)  G.debug |=  flag;
00188     else        G.debug &= ~flag;
00189     
00190     return 0;
00191 }
00192 
00193 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_app_debug_value_doc,
00194 "Int, number which can be set to non-zero values for testing purposes"
00195 );
00196 static PyObject *bpy_app_debug_value_get(PyObject *UNUSED(self), void *UNUSED(closure))
00197 {
00198     return PyLong_FromSsize_t(G.rt);
00199 }
00200 
00201 static int bpy_app_debug_value_set(PyObject *UNUSED(self), PyObject *value, void *UNUSED(closure))
00202 {
00203     int param = PyLong_AsSsize_t(value);
00204 
00205     if (param == -1 && PyErr_Occurred()) {
00206         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError, "bpy.app.debug_value can only be set to a whole number");
00207         return -1;
00208     }
00209     
00210     G.rt = param;
00211 
00212     return 0;
00213 }
00214 
00215 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_app_tempdir_doc,
00216 "String, the temp directory used by blender (read-only)"
00217 );
00218 static PyObject *bpy_app_tempdir_get(PyObject *UNUSED(self), void *UNUSED(closure))
00219 {
00220     return PyC_UnicodeFromByte(BLI_temporary_dir());
00221 }
00222 
00223 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_app_driver_dict_doc,
00224 "Dictionary for drivers namespace, editable in-place, reset on file load (read-only)"
00225 );
00226 static PyObject *bpy_app_driver_dict_get(PyObject *UNUSED(self), void *UNUSED(closure))
00227 {
00228     if (bpy_pydriver_Dict == NULL) {
00229         if (bpy_pydriver_create_dict() != 0) {
00230             PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError, "bpy.app.driver_namespace failed to create dictionary");
00231             return NULL;
00232         }
00233     }
00234 
00235     Py_INCREF(bpy_pydriver_Dict);
00236     return bpy_pydriver_Dict;
00237 }

00240 static PyGetSetDef bpy_app_getsets[] = {
00241     {(char *)"debug",        bpy_app_debug_get, bpy_app_debug_set, (char *)bpy_app_debug_doc, (void *)G_DEBUG},
00242     {(char *)"debug_ffmpeg", bpy_app_debug_get, bpy_app_debug_set, (char *)bpy_app_debug_doc, (void *)G_DEBUG_FFMPEG},
00243     {(char *)"debug_python", bpy_app_debug_get, bpy_app_debug_set, (char *)bpy_app_debug_doc, (void *)G_DEBUG_PYTHON},
00244     {(char *)"debug_events", bpy_app_debug_get, bpy_app_debug_set, (char *)bpy_app_debug_doc, (void *)G_DEBUG_EVENTS},
00245     {(char *)"debug_wm",     bpy_app_debug_get, bpy_app_debug_set, (char *)bpy_app_debug_doc, (void *)G_DEBUG_WM},
00246 
00247     {(char *)"debug_value", bpy_app_debug_value_get, bpy_app_debug_value_set, (char *)bpy_app_debug_value_doc, NULL},
00248     {(char *)"tempdir", bpy_app_tempdir_get, NULL, (char *)bpy_app_tempdir_doc, NULL},
00249     {(char *)"driver_namespace", bpy_app_driver_dict_get, NULL, (char *)bpy_app_driver_dict_doc, NULL},
00250     {NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL}
00251 };
00252 
00253 static void py_struct_seq_getset_init(void)
00254 {
00255     /* tricky dynamic members, not to py-spec! */
00256     PyGetSetDef *getset;
00257 
00258     for (getset = bpy_app_getsets; getset->name; getset++) {
00259         PyDict_SetItemString(BlenderAppType.tp_dict, getset->name, PyDescr_NewGetSet(&BlenderAppType, getset));
00260     }
00261 }
00262 /* end dynamic bpy.app */
00263 
00264 
00265 PyObject *BPY_app_struct(void)
00266 {
00267     PyObject *ret;
00268     
00269     PyStructSequence_InitType(&BlenderAppType, &app_info_desc);
00270 
00271     ret = make_app_info();
00272 
00273     /* prevent user from creating new instances */
00274     BlenderAppType.tp_init = NULL;
00275     BlenderAppType.tp_new = NULL;
00276     BlenderAppType.tp_hash = (hashfunc)_Py_HashPointer; /* without this we can't do set(sys.modules) [#29635] */
00277 
00278     /* kindof a hack ontop of PyStructSequence */
00279     py_struct_seq_getset_init();
00280 
00281     return ret;
00282 }
